meanings.sent1: There were zillions of stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: She had zillions of toys in her room.
meanings.sent3: The bakery made zillions of cookies for the event.
meanings.sent4: His collection of stamps seemed to multiply into zillions overnight.
meanings.sent5: The ants marched in zillions, forming a mesmerizing pattern.

meanings.definition: A very large amount or quantity
meanings.sent1: He had zillions of reasons to be happy.
meanings.sent2: The company made zillions in profit last year.
meanings.sent3: The children ran around the park in zillions, laughing and playing.
meanings.sent4: The waves crashed onto the shore in zillions, creating a soothing sound.
meanings.sent5: The artist used zillions of colors in the painting, creating a vibrant masterpiece.
